name: Lavender Berry Honey Infused Hair Perfume
categories: Fragrance, Women, Body Mist & Hair Mist
about: What it is:A hair perfume with notes of lavender, blackberries, and Mirsalehi Honey that refreshes, scents, hydrates, and adds shine..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Dryness.Key Benefits:- Scents hair with a long-lasting fragrance.Highlighted Ingredients:- Mirsalehi Honey: Hydrates and nourishes to restore hairu2019s natural moisture balance for healthy-looking, glossy hair..Ingredient Callouts:This product is cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:The Honey Infused Lavender Berry Hair Perfume contains scents of lavender, blackberries, and Mirsalehi honey, paired with notes of ginger and patchouli. This hair perfume delivers a long-lasting fragrance to refresh hair while adding shine and hydration with Mirsalehi honey and argan oil..Fragrance Description:This hair perfume is a warm and luxurious fragrance. This indulgent scent is balanced by earthy, floral lavender enriched with bursts of vibrant ginger and tart blackberries, reminiscent of childhood memories spent picking blackberries amongst the bees...Clean at Sephora
ingredients: -Mirsalehi Honey: Hydrates and nourishes to restore hair's natural moisture balance for healthy-looking, glossy hair..-Argan Oil: Nourishes, hydrates, and adds healthy-looking shine...Alcohol Denat., Aqua (Water/Eau), Parfum (Fragrance), Peg-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Mel (Honey, Miel)*, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Sodium Benzotriazolyl Butylphenol Sulfonate, Tris (Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Citronellol**, Coumarin**, Limonene**, Linalool**, Ci 19140 (Yellow 5), Ci 14700 (Red 4)...* Honey Sourced from the Mirsalehi Bee Garden .** Naturally Occurring Allergens ..The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spray evenly from an arm's length onto dry hair..-Give your hair a shake to diffuse the fresh scent....Pro tip: Start with Gisou's Honey Infused Oil (sold separately) to hydrate, smooth frizz, and boost shine. Follow with the Honey Infused Hair Perfume as a finishing touch.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Gisou Hair Perfume in Lavender Berry is a lovely balance between floral and fruity notes. After using it, my hair feels refreshed, with a subtle shine that doesnu2019t look oily or overly shiny.The honey leaves my hair feeling a little softer, which is a nice bonus. I apply the perfume from a distance to ensure even distribution. A couple of spritzes are enough to cover my whole head. Itu2019s easy to use on the go for a quick refresh during the day. I also like that itu2019s non-sticky, so thereu2019s no issue with layering it over other hair products. The lavender provides a soft, calming, herbaceous aroma that isnu2019t too strong, while the berry adds a juicy, sweet element. Together, they create a refreshing and uplifting fragrance thatu2019s subtle yet noticeable. Itu2019s not overwhelming, so you wonu2019t smell like youu2019re wearing heavy perfume, but it gives your hair a fresh, clean scent for hours. Overall, I love that itu2019s both a fragrant and functional product, adding a light shine and hydration while making my hair smell amazing.

It brings back nostalgic memories of picking blackberries in a sun-drenched garden, making each spritz a delightful sensory experience. The alcohol content evaporates quickly, ensuring the scent disperses evenly and doesnu2019t linger too long on my hair. Overall, itu2019s a perfect blend of luxury and functionality that enhances both my hairu2019s appearance and my mood.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin

Overall, the scent seems to last a while and doesn't dry out my hair, but who is coming up with this scent profile?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really appreciate how well rounded this fragrance is despite being just a hair perfume. I'm not the biggest fan of lavender but the juiciness of the blackberry really brightens the fragrance up while the honey gives it this sultry warmth and helps subdue the lavender even further. It smells SO good and lasts into the next day, it's perfect for me to use in between wash days for a little extra zhuzh. I also love how the patchouli is barely noticeable, I think the blackberry really helps sweeten it up so it's not grungy or earthy at all. It's a very smooth, sweet but not overly sweet fragrance that is complex enough that it doesn't smell juvenile or boring. The oils are great for my hair and help fight the dryness and friction I experience in my day to day. I never really found hair perfumes necessary, and they aren't, but I'm so pleasantly surprised by this fragrance; it's perfect for the days I don't want to wear an EDP but still want to smell nice and I can tell it will layer well with complimenting scents if I wanted. Absolutely worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells soooo good - mostly juicy and fruity with a light floral side. My son and husband both complimented me after I used it the first time. It's in a pretty bottle and I'm excited to add it to my vanity. The staying power is so-so. I do catch whiffs of it for a few hours, but it is certainly gone by the end of the day. It may have better staying power if you are purely indoors or maybe in colder weather. This would be a gorgeous gift for a friend who loves fragrance or little luxuries. It's not a necessity by any means but something that would be amazing to have for fancy nights out or just to feel pampered!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite hair perfume! I smell more notes of lavender and honey, rather than the berry. It smells very comforting and relaxing. It lasts pretty long for a hair perfume. I was able to smell it on my hair until the next day! The bottle is also absolutely gorgeous! Love this perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has been such a lovely addition to my haircare routine. It adds a beautiful sheen to my hair without weighing it down. The scent is light & sweet and it mixes well with whatever perfume Iu2019m wearing for the day. Bottle is gorgeous and looks great on display!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have never tried any Hair perfume, but this one from Gisou does not disappoint me! I love how it smells and how it does not leave my hair greasy at all! I also love that the hair perfume helps to keep my hair frizz free!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am in LOVE with the new Gisou Honey Infused Lavender Berry Hair Perfume. Itu2019s an absolutely gorgeous, layerable scent that lasts all day long. My hair is so soft with a glossy shine when I use this and I have received so many compliments!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually donu2019t like lavender scented things but this is an exception, it has a really nice floral smell and because it also has a berry scent the lavender isnu2019t overpowering so it smells like a regular floral perfume! It lasts a really long time and I love that itu2019s for hair because hair holds scent longer than anywhere else!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the scent! Smells so good and lasts for days in my hair. But if you're expecting a completely sweet fruity scent, this isn't it. I smell more lavender note than blackberry in this perfume. It makes my hair feed softer and I enjoy using it. Definitely a must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gisouu2019s Honey Infused Hair Perfume is a total delight! My hair feels like itu2019s been kissed by a field of flowers. The scent is dreamy, and it leaves my locks smelling divine and feeling silky smooth. Plus, itu2019s packed with natural goodness, so I feel like Iu2019m treating my hair to a spa day every time I use it. Highly recommend for anyone looking to add a touch of luxury to their haircare routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This smellu2019s divine. It left my hair smelling like fresh air and the honey notes a sweetness that was not intense but beautifully blended. I really appreciate the size and quality of the packaging. I wore it both as a hair mist and body mist and loved each turn of my hair movements to capture a brief bit of fragrance each time.  This was my first time trying anything from Visio and I was very impressed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This comes in a convenient spray bottle that allows you to spray this perfume directly into your hair. Unfortunately, the scent wasn't for me. I found it to be a bit too sweet and would have preferred more lavender. The scent lasts for a long time as I could smell it throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never tried a hair perfume before but i was blown away by this one! I love the sweet floral scent! It is a bit strong but it is long lasting which is amazing. Itu2019s also under 3.4fl oz which is tsa approved! I love that, itu2019s so convenient

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love spraying this hair perfume all over my head! I feel like this fragrance really holds well in the hair and makes my hair smell super clean & yummy. My new go to hair fragrance for every day usage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Gisou Honey Infused Hair Perfume in Lavender Berry is giving me all the sweet, floral vibes! The formulation feels light and doesnu2019t weigh down my curls, which I love. The scent is soft and fresh with a hint of lavender, which is perfect for any season! My hair felt refreshed and smelled amazing all day. However, I did notice that the scent faded a little quicker than I hoped. Overall, it's a fab pick-me-up for those in-between wash days, but I'd love it if the fragrance lasted longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! I loved it so much! my hair smells so elegant and i feel so put together. This perfumes adds the best finishing touch! 10/10 Recommend!

reviews.review_title: It's a part of my daily routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Third bottle of hair perfumeu2026 I have the original, rose, and this arrived today! I didnu2019t try it when it first came out a while back, but I fell in love with the hair perfumes for their subtle and sweet ways they make my hair smell amazing.. It literally lasts the whole day without being overpowering. It doesn't dry out my hair - itu2019s really healthy and touchable, and the shine from it is very noticeable. It doesn't mean my hair is down either - fine hair, but a lot of it. This lavender berry scent is so beautiful! You really can catch the berry sweet notes with the serious and calm scent of the lavender. The rose was the same for me when I first got it, where I didn't think Iu2019d like it as well as the original, but a couple of times of wearing it and smelling how fresh and sweet at the end of the day changed my mind. They like the smell of the rose as much as the original. Now, this scent is going to be added as a new favorite. These bottles last a very long time, even with me spraying my hair daily (it only takes 1 or 2 sprays) for all day amazing. I have sensitive skin and had no issue at all! I hope this scent is kept in the regular rotation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you love berry and vanilla scents, you will love this release! Not only is the packaging adorable and the spray/mist on the bottle amazing, it leaves your hair with a wonderful scent. Iu2019ve already had people ask me what Iu2019m wearing. All in all, if youu2019re on the fence I say go for it! This is definitely the scent of the fall/winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: im obsessed gisou hair products and this is such a lovely addition to the range. it sweets than the orignal but smells so good and the lavender comes out alot. it smells fresh but warm and does not weight my hair down

reviews.review_title: Smells like Festering Mold in a Cute Bottle
reviews.review_text: Smells like wet mold stuffed into a bottle and left to fester 35 years in the dark. Grade: F. Offensive scrubber. Would rate 0 if I could. The aesthetic is very cute but definitely save your money. Returned.
